page.title: 11Family Life
page.content: {A Day in the Life of Mr. V.J.F. - { Resident of Hillesley 1985 { {6.30a.m.}Alarm goes off - get up, wash and dress. {7.00a.m.}Breakfast (orange juice, cereal, toast and coffee), usually joined by one or both children aged 9 and 5 years. {7.30a.m.}Leave for work, avoiding main roads. { {8.00a.m.}Arrive at work in Soundwell, Bristol and joined by my partner, who is also my brother, at our accident repair firm. Attend to various matters {10.00a.m.}Coffee break and general discussion with our foreman. {1.00p.m.}Lunch - usually sandwiches taken in the office. {1.30p.m.}Return to work and check on the progress of the cars being repaired.
